ing.item: Honeydew melon; seeded, rind removed, cut into chunks
Green food coloring; or more if desired

directions.step:
In food processor bowl with metal blade or blender container, combine all ingredients; process until smooth.
Pour into 8 or 9-inch non-metal square pan. Cover; freeze until firm.
Scoop frozen mixture into 5-oz. drink cups or spoon into dessert dishes.
Yields 10 (1/2-cup) servings.
Notes: Pantry: Mott's Regular Apple Sauce. Use a well-ripened melon for optimum flavor in this refreshing low calorie ice.
